enter.steam.user.promt: Please enter the folder name you can find here. C:\Users\(Your username)\AppData\Roaming\Axolot Games\Scrap Mechanic\User
wrong.folder.input: ⚠ The specified folder is invalid or does not exist. Please check it and try again. {0} attempts remaining
gamepath.notfound: ⚠ Game path not found. Please check if Scrap Mechanic is installed.
gamepath.promt: Please enter the installation path of the Scrap Mechanic game:
main.menu.title: Main Menu
backup.menu.title: Backup Menu
backup.creating: Creating a backup of {0} files in {1}.
backup.no.backups: ⚠ No backups found. Please create a backup first ⚠
backup.load.prompt: Which backup should be loaded? (confirm with Enter)
backup.delete.prompt: Which backup should be deleted? (confirm with Enter)
backup.loading: Loading a backup of {0} SaveGames from Backup {1}...
backup.load.duplicates.optimized: Loading {0} linked files from other backups...
outfit.menu.title: Outfit Manager
outfit.menu.subtext:
Here you can save the outfits you created in-game and switch between them quickly.
Currently selected outfit: {0}
outfit.manager.name.promt: Please enter a name for the outfit:
outfit.manager.name.invalid: ❌ This name is not allowed, please choose another name
outfit.manager.name.exists: ❌ This name is already taken, please choose another one.
mods.menu.title: Manage Mods
mods.menu.change.active.mod.prompt: Which mod should be activated? (Confirm with Enter)
mods.menu.no.mods: ⚠ No mods found. Please add a mod first ⚠
mods.menu.vanillatomod.vanillasaved: Game files backed up. Installing mod files...
mods.menu.vanillatomod.done: ✅ Mod files installed. Have fun playing! Remember that multiplayer may no longer work
mods.menu.modtovanilla.moduninstall.done: Mod file uninstallation completed, restoring original files...
mods.menu.new.mod.description:
Here you can combine multiple compatible mods into one mod and install them. Please inform yourself about the compatibility and installation order of the individual mods, as this tool only handles the installation.
Possible inputs can be a path to a .zip file or a folder path, e.g. path to a Workshop (file mod).
mods.menu.new.mod.name.prompt: Please enter a name for the mod. (Confirm with Enter)
mods.menu.new.mod.name.invalid: ❌ This name is not allowed, please choose another name
mods.menu.new.mod.name.exists: ❌ This mod already exists, please choose another name
mods.menu.new.mod.path.prompt:
Please enter the path to the mod (folder path or file path with .zip filename) 
Confirm with Enter.
mods.menu.new.mod.path.invalid: ❌ The specified path is invalid or does not exist. Please check it and try again.
mods.menu.new.mod.add.more.mods.question: Do you want to add more mods?
mods.menu.new.mod.finished: ✅ The mod "{0}" was successfully created. Now you can activate it in the menu "{1}".
mods.menu.remove.mod.prompt: Which mod do you want to delete? (confirm with Enter)
mods.menu.remove.mod.active.warn: The selected mod is currently active. If you delete it, it will be deactivated first. Are you sure you want to do this?
mods.menu.remove.mod.all.warn: ⚠ Warning, you want to deactivate and delete all mods! Is that correct? You cannot undo it.
mods.menu.remove.mod.all.finished: ✅ All mods have been deactivated and deleted.
mods.menu.rename.mod.prompt: Which mod do you want to rename? (confirm with Enter)
mods.menu.rename.mod.name.prompt: Please enter a new name. (confirm with Enter)
mods.menu.rename.mod.done: ✅ The mod "{0}" was successfully renamed to "{1}"
mods.menu.update.prompt: Which mod do you want to update?
mods.menu.update.recover.vanilla: Uninstalling the active mod before updating...
mods.menu.update.recover.vanilla.done: ✅ The mod was successfully uninstalled for the update.
mods.menu.update.reactivate.mod.done: ✅ The mod was successfully reactivated. Have fun playing!
mods.menu.update.check.no.paths: ⚠ The current mod has no paths stored. Update cannot be performed.
mods.menu.update.check.paths.prompt: Is this mod file path still correct?
mods.menu.update.check.asktofixpath: Do you want to update the path? If not, it will be removed.
mods.menu.update.check.paths.done: Path verification is complete. These paths will be used:
mods.menu.update.available: An update is available for the mod.
mods.menu.autoupdate.prompt: Do you want to update now?
menu.wrong.keypress: ❌ Invalid input. Please press another key
picker.option.same: ❌ Selection is already active, please choose another option
settings.menu.title: Settings
setting.menu.subtext: Can also be changed in the Config.json
delete.all.prompt: ⚠ Do you really want to delete everything?
